verses.roman:
yei catura, sei kuruka rāja-viṣaya
rāja-dravya śodhi' pāya, tāra karuka vyaya"

synonyms: yei—one who; catura—intelligent; sei—such a person; kuruka—let him do; rāja-viṣaya—government service; rāja-dravya śodhi'-after paying the dues of the government; pāya—whatever he gets; tāra karuka vyaya—let him spend that.
translation: "If one is intelligent, let him perform service to the government, and after paying the government, he can spend whatever money is left."
